name: L.A. Drugs Bust
overview: L.A. Drugs Bust (also released as L.A. Police Dept.) is a simple rail shooter. The player plays the role of a Los Angeles police officer, and shoots enemy gangsters. The camera moves automatically, the player only moves an UZI's viewfinder. The uzi has very limited ammunition, but ammo and body armor can be liberated from the gang members. The player's energy will be depleted, when he is shot, or when he injures innocent civilians are in crossfire.
